Oppenheimer: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.
GOTG3: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.
SMATSV: Miles, Gwen, Peter B. And More Spiders must work side by side to stop Spot, a villain with portals on his body. This film is made by Sony Pictures Entertainment. This is not that much of a kids movie.
Creed3: Adonis has been thriving in both his career and family life, but when a childhood friend and former boxing prodigy resurfaces, the face-off is more than just a fight.
SFOTG: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word 'SHAZAM!' is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.
